data.text:
@node_scan Hello,
we kindly request you to inform us your tag number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@TheresaBrandon5 @theresabrandon5 Hello Theresa, we verify that the complaint you have submitted online is under analysis. We have reinforced it and kindly ask you to wait for the analysis to be concluded.  
You will receive a reply by e-mail at the earliest. Thank you for your understanding.

@AndyLemaire Hello Andy, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your frequent flyer number and email associated. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @Run_itt @run_itt Hello Dr. Ronit yarden, we replied to your direct messages. Thank you.

@KiaraKing4444 Hello Kiara,
we are verifying the situation and will get back to you via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@GimmieYoFood @gimmieyofood Hello Lee,
We are sorry for any inconvenience experienced. In order to assist you regarding some question, please provide us with your booking reference. For security reasons, we suggest to do it by direct message. Thank you

@monxi @monxi Hello monxi, we sincerely regret that the experience did not meet your expectations. In order to be able to assist you with some question, please provide us with your booking code.
For security reasons, we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@USAisHome Hello JD,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.

@DerrynScott Hello Derryn,
we are verifying the situation again and will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.

@mignightsnack @mignightsnack Hello Miguel, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by this situation. 
If we can assist you with some question please provide us with your booking code. For security reasons, we advise to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@gon_pctphy @gon_pctphy Hello Luciano, we replied to your direct message. 
Thank you.

@Michael35266538 Hello Michael,
we are verifying the situation. You will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@gon_pctphy Hello Luciano,

can you inform us through DM your TAP Miles & Go number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.

@Jali @FlySWISS Hello Charlie,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@sigleeso @AnaphylaxisUK @WrongedByTAP Sinéad,

we understand your point. However we cannot disallow other passenger to consume a certain product on board.
@BLR13 Hello Bailey, how can we help you?

@reginaabarrett Hello Regina,
May you please provide us your complaint number via DM? Thank you.
@h_kklh Hello K, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@NikkiHind Hello Nikki,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@AlisonDinning78 Hello Alison, 
We sent you a reply through DM.

@Joelmentum Hello Joel,

how may we assist you? Can you clarify your situation through DM so we may verify? Thank you.

@TheresaBrandon5 Hello Theresa,

accoriding to the information we have a voucher has been issued and sent by email as result of your refund request. Thank you.
@andy__harrison We have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@CuseyDamien @CaboVerde_Gov Hello Damien,

We verify that your claim process is still under analysis. Therefore, we kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you.

@davidtalisman Hello David,

have you filled a complaint report regarding that situation? Can you inform us through DM your complaint file number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.

@MattLoxham Hello Dr Matt,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.
@vinholland Solicitamos que aguarde por um contato da nossa parte, uma vez que será feito com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigado. (2/2)

@vinholland Olá vinholand,

Lamentamos o atraso na nossa resposta e pela inconveniência causada. O seu caso está a ser tratado com celeridade e o processo em si requer algum tempo para esse efeito. (1/2)

@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal We thank you for the details provided and inform that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if any further help is required. Thank you

@sigleeso @AnaphylaxisUK @WrongedByTAP This same information can be found on our website using the following link - https://t.co/z6wigIIpuB. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

urls.title: Special meals
urls.description: Enjoy dishes specially prepared for you - for free.

data.text: @sigleeso @AnaphylaxisUK @WrongedByTAP Please note that the service on board cannot be changed and we cannot control the food/products that other passengers carry on board. We recommend that you see your doctor before travelling and carry appropriate medication in your hand luggage.

data.text: @sigleeso @AnaphylaxisUK @WrongedByTAP Hi! Although we understand your considerations, if you have a severe inhalation/airborne allergy to particular food, TAP cannot guarantee that the cabin of the aircraft is free of the allergen in question.
@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your complaint number and the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance
@iurifarenzena De nada Iuri, disponha sempre. ✈️
@SilviaASM7 Ficamos ao dispor para qualquer esclarecimento adicional. Obrigada

@SilviaASM7 Olá! Embora compreendamos a sua urgência no tratamento da reclamação apresentada, asseguramos que o seu caso não está esquecido e será concluído com a maior brevidade possível, pelo que pedimos que aguarde por favor.
@FmTbE We cannot precise a time frame but will be made as soon as possible. Thank you
@FmTbE We cannot precise a time frame but will be made as soon as possible. Thank you

@FmTbE Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@FmTbE Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@FmTbE Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@FmTbE Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@FmTbE Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will be contacted by email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance
@IAlsoHatepitt Hello Brandon, we await the booking code or e-ticket by private message. Thank you.
@raglugluieie Ficamos ao dispor para qualquer esclarecimento adicional. Obrigada.

@raglugluieie Olá! Lamentamos desde já todos os inconvenientes causados pelo atraso do voo e a consequente perda de ligação. Informamos que, para efeitos de compensação ou reembolso de despesas tidas, deverá preencher o seguinte formulário disponível no nosso site em https://t.co/6xRkSKdkjm.

urls.title: Reclamação – Como podemos ajudar? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Queremos que tenha a melhor experiência TAP. Indique-nos a situação para que a possamos solucionar ou consulte o estado de uma reclamação já efetuada.

data.text: @ltavaram Hi! We deeply regret the time taken in processing your claim. Further information has been provided via DM. Thank you in advance

@KevinCore @kevincore Olá Kevin, compreendemos a situação e a sua frustração. Verificamos que a sua reclamação ainda se encontra em análise e que a mesma foi reforçada. 
Tão breve quanto possível receberá uma resposta por e-mail. Obrigada pela sua compreensão.
@Mkaj14411 Hello Mkaj1441, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@andy__harrison Hello Andy, we are sorry to read that and any inconvenience caused. In order to verify the situation, please provide us your lost baggage file number (PIR), TAG, case number or booking details by direct message, for confidentiality reasons. We thank you in advance.

@KubaChaloupka @kubachaloupka Hello Jakub, you kindly ask you to provide us with the booking code so that it can be verified. For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message.  
Thank you.
@jeremyatl1 Hello Jeremy, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@MrRaf96 @MrRaf96 Hello Rafeul, we have verified that the refund request was submitted on November 11th and is being processed. It will be completed as soon as possible. 
If we may assist with some additional question, please provide us the details by direct message. Thank you.
@PJR28979105 @pjr28979105 Hello, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@10CO10 Hello Cristiano, 
We apologize for the reported situation and all inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@AGulachenski @agulachenski Hello Alex, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@gialcantara Olá Gi, sugerimos que se mantenha atenta às redes sociais oficiais da TAP para estar informada sobre as nossas campanhas e promoções. Poderá igualmente receber as nossas melhores ofertas por email, assinando a newsletter TAP - https://t.co/fXMgx3XhA1 . Obrigado. ✈️
@lulucian @lulucian Hello, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@HarshilRulez @harshilrulez Hello, you may check the requirements through this link: https://t.co/MhvCLUmGXW
Thank you.

Hoje celebramos o verão de São Martinho e qual a melhor forma para aproveitar este dia? A apanhar banhos de sol no lugar da janela. 😎

Today we celebrate St. Martin's Summer and what's the best way to enjoy this day? Sunbathing in the window seat. 😎

📷: IG sonhealtoviagens https://t.co/0dIOC5EXv8

@Rachel15627854 @rachel15627854 Hello Rachel, we are sorry for the inconvenience. The estimated time of departure for flight TP1331 (November 11th) is at 11h50am. 
If you have additional questions, please let us know. Thank you.
@pomagas @pomagas Hello Carla, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@BronzatiMario @bronzatimario Olá Mario, lamentamos qualquer transtorno experienciado. Para que possamos verificar pedimos que nos indique os dados por mensagem direta.
Obrigado.

@LauraDesmond95 @LauraDesmond95 Hello Laura, we sincerely apologize for the inconveniences caused. As informed, the bank transfer has been requested and will be processed as soon as possible.  
Thank you for your comprehension.
@bookisa4letter @bookisa4letter Hola Saray, hemos contestado a través de mensaje privado. Gracias.

@arianesconrad Hello again Ariane,
We have already replied to your DM.

@Natalia16082009 Natalia,
Já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.

@Shannon_alba Hello Shannon,
We answered per DM.

@LinaLeaner Hello Lina,
We answered per DM.
@gedanina Pode indicar-nos o código de reserva, por favor? Por questões de segurança, sugerimos que o faça por mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@angelkino89 Hola Angel,
Hemos ya contestado a sus mensajes privados. Gracias

@bcstagg Hello Barry,
We present our most sincere apologies for all inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the lost luggage claim file reference. 
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@saulpdm Hello Saul,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronci ticket number (047...), such as the change you wish to make so we may verify? Thank you.

@areyousheerio Hello ju,
May you please provide us your complaint number via DM?

@adbgardezani Olá Adalberto,
Indique-nos por favor o seu código de reserva via DM para o podermos assistir. Obrigada.

@Kushal_Narain Hello Kushal,
We have just replied to your DM.

@cherryredstool Olá Jess,
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem noutra rede. Pedimos que mantenha o contacto apenas por uma via. Obrigada

@piquecantropus @iflymia Hello,
At this moment, we do not have any information a flight delay regarding TP224. Please let us know if you have any other questions. Thank you

@ThePetLadyBH Olá Carol,
Caso necessite da nossa assistência para efetuar a remarcação da sua viagem, indique-nos por favor o seu código de reserva via mensagem privada.
@gedanina Olá Nina, recebeu algum código de reserva?
@saratu Hello S, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@luismsalves19 Por vezes, devido à proximidade da hora do voo, não nos é possível efetuar esse comunicado. No entanto, lamentamos qualquer inconveniente que estas situações tenham causado. 
Caso possamos ser úteis , por favor contacte-nos por mensagem privada. Obrigada. (2/2)

@luismsalves19 Olá Luís, informamos que tentamos avisar os nossos passageiros com a maior antecedência possível em caso de irregularidades operacionais, as quais tentamos evitar até ao último instante. (1/2)
@D_rex_ Hello Daniel, we inform you that we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@ChrisMalec13 Hello Chris, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private  message. Thank you.

@aswinlutchanah @aswinlutchanah Hello Aswin, we replied to your direct message. 
Thank you.

@Xpere_ @xpere_ Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience.
Can you please provide us with the PIR code regarding your lost property? For confidential reasons we suggest to do it by direct message. Thank you

urls.title: Voar com animais de estimação
urls.description: Na TAP transportamos o seu animal de estimação, na cabine ou no porão, sempre em segurança e com conforto.

data.text:
@mathieu3578 Cependant, nous vous assurons que tout est mis en œuvre pour le faire le plus rapidement possible. 
Nous apprécions votre compréhension et restons disponibles pour toute précision supplémentaire. Merci. (2/2)

@mathieu3578 Bonjour Poirier, nous nous excusons pour ce délai.
Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de vous indiquer une date limite en ce moment. (1/2)

@IAlsoHatepitt Hello Brandon, we apologize for the delay.
In order to verify, we kindly ask you to send us, via private message, the booking reference or e-ticket number and correction needed. Thank you.
